A Journey Through Rooptal

Travel Blogger
August 1, 2025

Experience the tranquil beauty and local culture of Rooptal, a lesser-known gem in the Garhwal Himalayas. This high-altitude lake is surrounded by lush greenery and offers a peaceful retreat away from the crowded tourist spots. The journey to Rooptal is as beautiful as the destination itself, with opportunities to interact with local villagers and learn about their way of life.
